content.text: I'm pretty good, thanks for asking. I'm starting my day by responding to messages from potential dates.
Oh, that's exciting! Are you looking forward to meeting any of them?
Yes, I think so. I'm kind of nervous, but also excited.
I know the feeling. I've been seeing a therapist lately, and I'm not sure how to tell my parents about it.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope things are going well with your therapist.
Thank you. They are. It's just hard to talk about with my parents.
I can understand that. It can be hard to talk about personal things with your family.
Yeah. But I know I need to tell them eventually.
If you want, I can be there for you when you tell them.
Thanks. I appreciate that. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
No problem. Just know that I'm here for you.
